body:
qrupdate did hard set FC=gfortran ; we change that to compile with ifort or nvfortran, with or without ilp64.
Parallel compilation is now allowed calling $(MAKE) instead of make for subprocess :
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/24818095/warning-forced-in-submake-in-parallel-execution-of-make
The build phase is split since the process always requires a target.
title: qrupdate: make it compiled with the requested Fortran compiler
